name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Fullstack Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, leveraging a strong skill set that includes **Java**, **Go**, **Jakarta**, **Angular**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and robust database management with **Oracle** and **SQL**. Demonstrated expertise in developing and deploying cloud-native applications with proficiency in **JBoss**, **Wildfly**, and CI/CD automation, ensuring solutions are efficient and secure. Proven ability in software design, planning, and concept creation, with a focus on building maintainable enterprise platforms. Additionally, brings hands-on experience in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, ensuring compliance with industry standards. Passionate about creating impactful, scalable solutions that enhance user experience and drive business success.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions using **Java**, **Go**, and **Typescript**, ensuring adherence to software design principles and planning methodologies.
• Developed enterprise applications leveraging **Angular**, **Java**, and **Docker**, enhancing user experience and maintaining high performance in production.
• Led migration of traditional architectures to microservices using **Kubernetes** and **Docker**, improving scalability and deployment efficiency by **40%**.
• Utilized **Oracle** and **SQL** for efficient data management and storage solutions, optimizing performance for high-throughput transaction processing.
• Implemented rigorous test strategies using **JMeter** and automated testing tools, achieving **95%** test coverage across multiple services.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams in concept creation and planning, resulting in streamlined workflows and improved project delivery timelines by **30%**.
• Developed and maintained APIs using **Java** and **Spring Boot** for seamless integration with client-side applications, ensuring smooth data flow and user engagement.
• Integrated advanced networking solutions to enhance application communication and resolved performance bottlenecks, reducing latency by **25%**.
• Mentored junior developers in **Java**, **Go**, and **Typescript**, fostering a culture of continuous learning and code excellence in the engineering team.
• Engaged in code reviews and architectural discussions, contributing to the overall improvement of software quality and maintaining a high standard of engineering practices.

- Leveraged **Java** and **Go** to develop and maintain robust software solutions within high-traffic environments, ensuring scalability and performance.
- Collaborated in an Agile environment using **Kubernetes** to orchestrate containerized applications with **Docker**, enhancing deployment efficiency by **40%**.
- Engaged in the design and development of data-centric applications utilizing **Oracle** and **SQL**, improving query performance and database interactions by **25%**.
- Implemented front-end solutions using **Angular** and **Typescript** to enhance user engagement and satisfaction, resulting in a **30%** increase in application adoption rates.
- Enhanced software design processes by applying best practices and methodologies, leading to a **20%** reduction in project delivery timelines.
- Conducted performance testing and optimization using **JMeter**, identifying bottlenecks and improving response times by **15%**.
- Developed microservices and ensured effective network configurations, supporting high availability and resilience within distributed architectures.
- Spearheaded the planning and concept creation of new features, consistently receiving positive feedback from stakeholders.
- Maintained and upgraded existing systems including setups involving **JBoss** and **Wildfly**, ensuring seamless operations during transitions.
- Directly contributed to code reviews and mentorship for junior engineers, fostering a collaborative team environment and knowledge sharing.

Utilized **Kubernetes** and **Docker** for container orchestration and deployment, enhancing application scalability and resource management across distributed environments.
Developed robust backend services utilizing **Java** and **Go**, employing best practices in **Software Design** to ensure maintainability and efficiency of the codebase.
Implemented APIs and microservices in **JBoss** and **Wildfly**, facilitating smooth integration with various front-end technologies and supporting high-demand e-commerce functionalities.
Engaged in **Planning** and **Concept Creation** for application features and enhancements, adhering to Agile methodologies to drive project success and timely delivery.
Employed **SQL** and **PL/SQL** for complex data queries and database management, optimizing performance for high-traffic scenarios and ensuring data integrity.
Created dynamic web applications using **Angular** along with **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**, focusing on building responsive user interfaces that provide seamless user experiences.
Conducted performance testing using **JMeter** to identify and mitigate bottlenecks, ensuring system reliability under varying loads.
Fostered strong networking capabilities to enhance communication between microservices and external API integrations, improving overall system interoperability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement best practices in project management, ensuring effective resource allocation and timely completion of deliverables.
